website_summaries.verdict: A good option if used properly and directions are followed. Price and comfort make this brace the Best Bang for Your Buck.
pros: Comfortable brace at a reasonable price helps with a variety of ailments
cons: One size does not fit all, and the brace does not fit some users with larger waists
Straps are too long, and the brace is too heavy

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled size!
customer_reviews.text: The description of the regular size of this item is "28" to 50" waist." I bought a regular size because my waIst is well within the 28"=50" range. However, the belt would not go around my waist. I would not have bought it if I had known that it would not fit on a waist within the 28"-50" range. And I cannot return it because i Hs ro open the package to learn that it would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Watch your back
customer_reviews.text: This back support says it has a lumbar support and, in fact, it shows what is supposed to be a lumbar support. However, I could not feel any support at all. My car has a better lumbar support than this. Not only that, it states that it fits waists 28" - 50" wiasts. I could barely get it around my 30" waist. Once I did get it on, I had no lumbar support and couldn't breathe. May be good for someone with a waist less than 28 inches.
customer_reviews.author: MeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I put it on the minute I got it and I actually am standing a little bit straighter and my back pain is slowly going away! And it's easily concealed beneath shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took my back pain away!!!! Must have
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been experiencing major back pain due to the new job I got last year working for a Dialysis company. I didn’t think I’d get to the point where I would need a back brace. But I sure did.!! And I’m so glad I did. This back brace did wonders for my back. Took the pain away the moment I put it on for work. I use it at home to do house work as well. I’m very satisfied with this product and so is my back. If u need a back brace .. look no further. This is the one you need!!
customer_reviews.author: Gstylemua777

customer_reviews.title: The belt ruins good men’s clothes
customer_reviews.text: The belt ruins good men’s clothes, but is ok with blue jeans. It is designed with 4 “tabs” that overlap across the front with Hugh . Unfortunately, the second tab is the “hooks” part of the Velcro tab and it faces faces into my body. In addition, this second tab is much larger than the first tab, causubg the hooks to catch coy clothes. This has ruined two pair of good pants and a couple of shirts. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tall, causes pain.
customer_reviews.text: It hurt incredibly bad. I'm 5'9 and I figured that was an average enough height but apparently not. This thing either dug into my ribcage or into my hips really bad. I tried easing into it, but I could never get used to it. I'd prefer my back pain to this any day. I think it's just my shape or something, so it prolly works for others. But it does not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Delle

customer_reviews.title: Triple Strength Velcro - Super Tight - GREAT support for buldging disc
customer_reviews.text: Own three of these after nearly herniating an L3-L4 and L4-L5 degenerated, bulging disc. Two years after the injury, I have pain after sitting for about 30 minutes. If I use this while sitting, I have no pain at all. I also use this while weed wacking now, and it works wonders. Have not had any issues, pain, or sciatica and I have recommend this to many friends. Purchased my first one from wal-mart, but afterwards ordered from Amazon. I have three around the house; one for mowing/cleaning, and two for taking to work. Best back brace I've used with a triple velcro latch so that it gets really tight.
customer_reviews.author: JB_From_MD

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my back more then it helps. Plus no return
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue how this has so many good reviews. First it was 3 days late on shipping then I get it and think yes finally my back is going to start feeling better. Know I got the 28 to 50 which I'm 6 ft and waist is 36 in Jean's well I cant even get the thing on with out really sucking it in. Know I'm no were over weight but this thing will kill me if I had to wear it for a shift at work in a warehouse. I wore it for 15 mins and said theres no way. Plus it said free returns well that's a lie if you open the plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Wow...it worked!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 58, 6'1", 260 lbs with a 44 waist. When I do stuff (like vacuuming or yard work), my lower back hurts for days and it sucks. My wife suggested I try a belt. I've worn it 3 times now. Today I was raking and picking up these thorny seed things from the lawn. I hadn't bent over this much in awhile. It's now about 12 hours later and I don't have any lower back pain. I'm shocked and super happy! I thought I'd just be living with back pain every time I did something. I hope you all have similar success with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Neither size fit - Returned
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 Star because I’m not able to give a review on how this product actually works. I was excited to purchase after reading all the great reviews, however neither the small or large sizes fit me. The small didn’t fit around me (though I did take measurements per instructions). So I ordered the larger one, which was HUGE! It was also very heavy. I’m of short stature (5’1”). The width was wide and didn’t “sit” properly on my trunk/hips. So, disappointed there wasn’t an in between size because I would have loved to try this!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Poff

customer_reviews.title: Does not support proper arch of lower back
customer_reviews.text: This back support does not encourage an arch of the lower back. I have a herniated disk in my lower back, due largly to a posterior pelvic tilt (flat lower back) i have been working to correct the curve and was hoping this support would give me arch support while i relax but it almost has an opposite effect and pushes my back flat. It is basically a wide elastic belt. This may be helpful in preventing muscles to engage, if thats what you need, but it is not supportive of proper posture. I am 5’7 140lbs
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: This is the Lumbarnator!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who had lower back surgery for a ruptured disc, 2 years ago. After wearing the back brace for 2 shifts of work, his comment was: "Dude, the back brace helps massively with my pain. Thank you so much for hooking me up, this brace is a life saver." That sounds like a glowing recommendation to me. He is a plus size guy.....waist size of 56, so I bought the plus size and it fits him well.
customer_reviews.author: WhoopieDoodle

customer_reviews.title: Size Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Ordered regular size that says it fits up to waist 50" and needed it to fit waist 46" but it lacks about 8 inches closing! Can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but really bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I read the reviews or description incorrectly, but this brace is super bulky. I couldn't get my pants over it, so I had to leave them unzipped and wear a long shirt. I think this brace is probably meant for more severe back issues on someone who needs a ton of support. My need was more minor and this brace was overkill. I think it still serves a purpose, but I removed one star for the massive size and bulkiness. Perhaps that to be expected with a back brace. I dunno. I just expected something more discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Hvns2Betse

customer_reviews.title: This thing actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about this product. I've had chronic back pain for years and quite frankly I'm looking for anything that can help give me some relief. When I got the belt I thought the 3 strap bands seemed goofy and gimmicky, but I followed the directions and tried it out. Wow, this thing really works! I have noticed a real difference since I started wearing the brace. Less back pack, and a tighter feeling in my abdominal muscles. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I get lower back pain. Getting old sucks. The last time it happened was when I was unloading the dishes, so I've told my wife that dishes cause injuries and I should avoid them at all costs. I don't think she believed me though. I bought this based on all the great reviews. I'm glad to report that they were right on. Fairly easy to put on and is quite supportive without being overly restrictive. Sitting for prolonged periods of time is a bit uncomfortable because they material will dig into your sides, but other than that, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for by dad who has had two back surgeries. I ordered it close to his waist size but he says it is too small. He said it squeezes him and can't wear it. He lives in an ALF and asked for help and the med AIDS had a hard time with it also. Oh well, we have to order larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Covers his Spot!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this may sound weird, but I bought this for our Horse Shoer. See he works on our horses, and we need his services. This is a special back support with a pad in the lumbar area. Told him to move the pad till it is right over his “spot.” Then cinch up the belt. Tension when he works on horses or lifting equipment. He looked at me, what spot? I told him folks with a sore back, or bad back have a spot. They know where it is, but can’t explain to others. He LOVES THIS BELT. It covers his “Spot”
customer_reviews.author: Happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Super supportive & great for back pain
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic back brace! Very supportive & as comfortable as a back brace can be. I’ve had many back braces over the years, and this one is great! The Velcro is SUPER strong, so my only comment would be: If you hate the sound of ripping Velcro, this brace may make you crazy. It’s a 2 step process to put on & take off (for the inner & outer bands), so that’s something to take into consideration if you need to take it on-and-off a lot (like to go to the bathroom) Aside from that, I give it 5 stars for incredible support & pain relief! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent back support and is easy to put on. I strained my back lifting and after wearing it for a week my back pains went away. For those of you who need a 4x or larger this one is as good as you can find for the price. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Texican13

customer_reviews.title: Brace yourself for this revoew
customer_reviews.text: So i honestly bought this because i am overweight and am getting a lot of back pain lately...i ordered this and got it today and put it on right away and for two hours i bent over like an idiot due to the brace of course but i am relatively pain free in my back! This is shocking to me and i am thrilled! I leave for Disney tomorrow so I’m going to see how this holds up. As for the fit since it’s plus size and i am just barely over the limit for the other ones so it’s pretty big but quality is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jepsen

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is a great line.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is a great line.....I give it only one star because I had to return two of them.......one was HUUUUUUUGE......so I bought the one for up to 50in waste and it was way to small......so I picked one up at Walmart.....guess it's a product you need to try on and then buy......the one from walmart fits great......this product is AWSOME......just hard to buy online......for me it was
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Been suffering from back pain for over 20 years. Trust me I Know Pain!!!! Been putting off buying a back brace forever. After much research I decided on this one. I'm so glad I did. Usually I can only stand for 5 to 10 min at a time and it feels like my back just locks up on me and the pain sets in!!!! I put this on and I was able to stand and walk around for an hour or so. I'm totally hooked
customer_reviews.author: CaySea

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear under my scrubs, its impossible to do so. You can't work and wear it. Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: loriann

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: This belt offers good support, but it does feel kind of bulky. I wear it to work with preschoolers, in case I have to lift or otherwise risk flaring up my back (degenerative disks, etc.). However, when I am riding my bike, I can feel it dig slightly into my groin. This is a problem as I ride for my daily commutes. And it looks more bulky under my clothing than the ACE brand one I had before it (which, BTW, also has grab straps on the adjustable Velcro crossover parts, and I miss those on this brand). But for long drives or flights, it is definitely helpful, and it seems to have been made to last.
customer_reviews.author: DHP

customer_reviews.title: Medium lumbar support not wide, and just under what I would like the length to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have the larger belt (50" - 70"), and it has become so large that I am having a difficult time getting it tight. I purchased the middle one they sell, the 28" to 50" belt. I immediately noticed that it is half the width of the larger belt, and I can just barely get it around my waist and fastened. However, being less wide than the larger belt it wants to roll up too much. I'll keep using the larger one until I lose enough on my waist line in order for the new on to fit!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M Romano

customer_reviews.title: ... have back problems and wanted something that gave me good support. I have discs that slip and stenosis
customer_reviews.text: I have back problems and wanted something that gave me good support. I have discs that slip and stenosis, and need something that really holds my back firmly in place. This seems well made, but does not have the support that I was hoping for. It seems more like a "sweat belt," and does not have good vertical support. I returned it and am going to get a weight lifting belt instead to get the firmer support that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Sherrard

customer_reviews.title: Strong fastener and comfortable to wear.  No regrets buying it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this for 2 months. I probably wear it 5 or 6 hours a day. The hook and loop (Velcro) is very strong. I have to use some force to get it to release. Which is good because you need the brace to remain secure while you are wearing it. I had to remove the lumbar patch. It easily is removed by peeling it off. It was causing some discomfort. I thought it was the brace and it ended up being the lumbar support. I don't mind wearing it. It is comfortable....well as comfortable as something squeezing you can be.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M.

customer_reviews.title: Great brace overall.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this brace has been very helpful. It hasn't eliminated the pain but it's definitely helped ease the pain substantially. My only issue is that while the brace doesn't roll up, the additional straps tend to slip. I'm a larger guy so to put it bluntly, the extra straps slip under my belly which is incredibly uncomfortable. If there was Velcro on the entire strap instead of just the very tip, it would resolve the issue. I'm probably just going to buy some Velcro and attach it to keep it from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Nocella

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lower back, but can get uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This back brace is great for a lower back pain but it gets very uncomfortable after prolonged use. I tend to not use this as much as intended, and opt in for pain relief patches instead, especially if I am going to be sitting on the couch or chair for some time. The tension strap is really great though. You can easily adjust the amount of tension the brace would have. I feel this would fit all body sizes and shape because it is quite adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: mickey hwang

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase, don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst lumbar support I’ve bought in my life, I bought this product cuz my older belt is on its last days... first of all the measures are way wrong... if you’re a size 40-50 you are not going to be able to breathe or sit down, my lumbar pain didn’t get any better and it’s super uncomfortable when you sit down, I also didn’t feel like it gave me better support, I wore the belt all day and it really hurt my skin and left mark. I should’ve listened to the other bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing back support belt.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing belt for size 40” above- i had the regular Mueller belt which fit a bit snug but this XXL is perfect, And although it’s meant for size is way above 40 it does not look awkward any way or super big when wrapped. Now I can wear it either very loose or very tight however I’d like with perfect back support and very comfortable overall. Probably the best belt for back support I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo E

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from 4 bulging discs from the l-4/5 to the S-1/2. I'm a heavy dude with a heavy gut and a miserable, overworked lumbar, that shoots pain down my spine and pelvis every day. This belt took away the pain and gives my back much needed support. I was skeptical at first, but this belt fit me, it is a quality product made of quality materials, so it stays on snug and tight and doesnt roll or slide off. Best purchase I've made this year!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment problems problems may not be for you
customer_reviews.text: The belt is some what difficult to get adjusted properly and even harder to keep there I have to stop several times and readjust it it either starts dropping down way to low or rising high. I have had serious back problems for most of my adult life so at least 35 years and have had several back braces this one seems to be one of the hardest to keep in place it is a well made belt just cannot seem to figure it out hopefully the answer is ther will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Increased my stability
customer_reviews.text: I discovered that i have degenerative disk in my back and lets just say a majority of my day is spent in pain. I always have been an athletic person before my back problems got in my way. Using this brace I find it much easier for me to do heavy and light lifting throughout the day as needed. I think it's a smart investment if you have back problems and icy hot and pain meds just aren't doing the job!
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: My mom love it, high quality compare to more espensive band.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the one $34 bucks and return it cause it too thin and not have enough velcro. This one nice, good support, kind of thick material giving you the feeling of stable but also soft and not giving you hurtful . In short, feel good. Is it help with hurt on my mom's lumbar ? not very much. Is it help with prevent damage on your lumbar ? sure it help a lot. It can prevent my mom's lumbar getting worse. Also the weight very good, not thin or too light. Not heavy at all. Easy to fit any body with all big size Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help my lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I like that they had the double overlapping straps but this has done nothing for my back pain at all. I would give it to my husband for a workout brace but he already has one. It’s also to late to send it back but it’s too late now...was trying to give it a chance but it’s not working for me
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: Way too big and heavy for me.
customer_reviews.text: Guess I just over estimated what this size would be. The smaller size was on the edge of being too small, so I thought I'd try the larger size. My advice: stretch the smaller size if you are a tweener and forget this one. In a way this makes me feel smaller than I thought I was. These are great back braces though. I've really grown to love the smaller one when my back is acting up.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Very strong Velcro and elastic
customer_reviews.text: It helps my back quite a bit. I'm better off if I just put it on early in the day before I start having numbness and weakness in my leg from bulging disk on sciatica. I find it to be much more comfortable over a light tee shirt. Velcro is very strong. Seems extremely well made.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Relief for aching back
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost is Amazon's prime shipping. Yesterday I looked for the two braces I had, but could not find them. Just moved with many people putting things away. I could have kept searching, but I know help would be on the way. I have found the braces to give me relief. The other two were also purchased from Amazon. With the situation we are in now, quarantined, This is my only way of purchasing. It arrived in less than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Carol N

customer_reviews.title: Works well but beware of extended use
customer_reviews.text: After a bout of lower back pain, I purchased this item and found that it did help alleviate my pain. My chiropractor warned me not to use it all the time because your body could end up relying on it too much. Another reason I found on my own is that because this brace basically squeezes your body in where all your digestive organs are, it could cause you to have other digestion issues later in the day. I even found that wearing it made some of my pain medication not kick in as fast or at all until I removed it.
customer_reviews.author: socos

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to fit up to a 50-inch waist - not. It was too tight, uncomfortable. I see now that other reviewers noted the same thing. Too bad because it was well made and probably would have helped with my pain. Now I have to wait until I can find another one and can only hope that one will fit according to their size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Sammypot

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: My orthopedist recommended this instead of one he could sell me for hundreds of dollars. Said it was exactly the same. I only wear it when my back is hurting badly and I need to keep doing stuff, or to prevent pain- like when I’m weed whacking the lawn. It goes around your hips more than your waist- and does wonders. I have arthritis in my lower back that is causing bursitis in my hips, and this is only part of what I am doing for it (I’m also going to the gym and strengthening my core), but for its part- it’s magnificent!
customer_reviews.author: M. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed & Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bulky, thick, and uncomfortable. Shows threw all clothing and very restricting. I am going to try a tommy sleeve, those seem like a better product. This was not worth the money, and hits at all the wrong spots. It basically covers your entire torso, and not just the bottom. BTW, I am 5'7", so I am not short. Only time this would be good is if you are intentionally wearing it while standing or sitting very straight up in a chain doing posture exercise for like 15-20 minutes. Not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: BearBear

customer_reviews.title: TEN STAR SUPPORT, COMFORT, AND PAIN RELIEF!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? The brace is well-designed and robustly constructed from high-quality materials. Easy-on and easy off, it was my bro's best friend after badly bruising three ribs recently, providing welcome midriff support & stability as well as pain relief. He also uses it for support when assisting our elderly mom from bed to armchair. And I borrow it when helping with lifting tasks or all-day efforts. Also note that the sizing IS just as advertised: Bro is a slender/rangy 5'10", while I'm a plus size gal of the same height, and this fabulous belt fits us both!!! Ordering my own the moment after this review is posted! :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria LC

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed the heated back brace for about 4 months before the plug on the brace stopped working. The portable battery still works (at about 50% capacity, so it did deteriorate quickly), but now the plug on the brace itself no longer works to receive power. Very disappointing to have the heating function due on you within just a few months of ownership. Hoping there’s some kind of warranty on this...
customer_reviews.author: Mar D

customer_reviews.title: Instant pain relief... very happy I ordered this!
customer_reviews.text: This belt worked *instantly* for my pain, and I'm very happy about that. However, it is good for short-term pain relief only, since I can't wear it 24-7... but it DOES WORK wonders while its on. I recommend using it until you have a chance to see a doctor or chiropractor for more permanent relief. This product is very well built of sturdy materials.
customer_reviews.author: C+V Blouir

customer_reviews.title: Rolled down...
customer_reviews.text: Its always like that, all really good products going bad with the time, it affects quality or function or both or even more, in that case, I just bought this particular belt by Mueller cause I use to buy one 2 years ago from Walmart, and that was amazing experience, now it seems like Mueller going cheap as other brands, they correct functionality by change support system (back in the days this belt had more plastic supports on the backside) and also found flimsy textile now... Overall not bad, but not comparable with the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: One of the better belts out there, 260lb athletic frame,lower lumbar back pain stabilized.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago, soon after several friends did the same after trying out mine , i lost mines and am now coming back for another today , please do note the Velcro dose loose its grip after several long months of constant use , i work in a warehouse and this belt last the longest of several, it really grips ur back and keeps ur spine disks in place ,the lumbar pad in the back really gives u an extra push feels great ! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 🎅

customer_reviews.title: It works but hurts
customer_reviews.text: This brace offers good support at the expense of comfort. The velcro flaps in the front cannot be positioned to NOT cause discomfort when bending at the waist. It digs in to my waist, to some extent, and it gets worse with time worn. I find myself taking this off to relieve the discomfort..which is why I bought it in the first place. It does offer decent lower back support and i do feel an improvement in strain levels when bending and lifting. I just wish it wasnt painful to work in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D Preiss

customer_reviews.title: My back loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have scoliosis and have suffered from herniated and ruptured discs and I have constant back pain. This back brace has helped a lot and is very comfortable and can be worn under clothes without being noticeable. The belt is adjustable and very flexible and I wear it when I go for walks and it really makes a difference. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, great results!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! I suffer from lower back pain after a car wreck and my chiropractor advised me to purchase a back brace. I am so happy with this purchase! I wear it at work while lifting items but don’t even want to take it off when I get home. It has multiple layers of Velcro for a snug, comfortable fit. My lower back sways in, adding to my pain but this brace helps straighten my lower back and helps my pain tremendously. If you’re considering a brace, buy this! I can’t get over how reasonable the price is. I’ve already purchased another for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT
customer_reviews.text: order this brace Saturday with mixed emotions given reviews suggesting there were "SIZE ISSUES" - Monday morning and its here already. I ordered the "28-50" size; I'm 5'11" @ 195lbs 34-36" waist. not only does it FIT GREAT but it is easy to snug up tightly. very well made. I have just now ordered another - so now I will have one readily available in BOTH of my shops - no more back strains for me. ADDENDUM: I ordered the second once MONDAY and it was here TUESDAY - same great fit and quality. need a back brace? GET THIS ONE
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Will fit a plus size person easily
customer_reviews.text: I possibly could have used the smaller size, but went for the larger. I’ve unfortunately got quite a belly and have had issues with supports rolling down. This belt is wide and provides great support. The Velcro is strong and stays where you put it. Very satisfied! Allows me to be mobile on days that I couldn’t without it.
customer_reviews.author: INSLAYNE

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this highly enough!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I've ever gotten along before purchasing this thing! After 3 c-sections and a few other abdominal surgeries, my core strength was totally nonexistent, leaving my lower back to work double-duty to compensate. Most days I could barely move from stiffness and back spasms by the time bedtime rolled around. I love the durability and thickness of the lumbar support pad - hits exactly where you need it to, and feels like a firm palm applying soothing pressure to the small of your back. I'm no lightweight (150 lbs), but a regular (28-50 inches) fit me just fine. Only complaint is that it does get a little hot after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Selah Campillo

customer_reviews.title: Way too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my parents in the larger size, but it is way too big. The small is too small and the larger one is way too large, not to mention the fact that this thing feels like it weighs 10 pounds. It's bulky, cumbersome, and extremely heavy. If your back wasn't hurting before, this might just cause it to hurt based on the sheer weight and awkwardness of the thing. I will give it credit for quality. It is extremely durable. The Velcro sticks and does not want to come unstuck. This gets a 3 star rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, sturdy and strong. Best support!
customer_reviews.text: Have been pulling my back more as I get older. I tried many back supports but this one take the cake. it’s very bulking but it does it job, doesn’t lose it shape and keeps its hold but Over time the Velcro comes apart. So try not to take off if you don’t need to. Really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Doongy

customer_reviews.title: Helps with lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: My husband has disc degeneration, but still works construction. He comes home hunched over and in pain daily. I purchased this to see if it would provide some support and lower the amount of pain he is in. It doesn't take away the pain completely of course, but it has significantly lowered the amount of pain he is in at the end of the day. He likes that it is adjustable to fit him for comfort, and finds that he can work just fine wearing it all day. His only complaint is that it can get very hot wearing it - but when wearing extra clothing, it is expected!
customer_reviews.author: KatanaAvion

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the measurements before purchasing. It indicated that with a 29 inch waist I would get a small/medium and that this size was appropriate for up to a 34 inch waist. Of course you expect this product will be tight, but good lord, it takes major effort to close it and I can't breathe! I'm five three and 123 pounds and I am being Cut. In. Half. I imagine that the whalebone corsets from days of yore were much like this. If you don't have a wasp waist, consider sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: the Lost Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Good brace, but women beware...it will ride up above your hips.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this brace is solid at an affordable price. I was a little concerned that it would be too big for me (5'4"/120). It's not--it fits in that regard. My issue is that it's constantly riding up above my hips. About every 10 minutes I have to tug it back down so that the lumbar pad is in position. I will continue to wear it, since I just bought it for doing stuff around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer24601

customer_reviews.title: 60 inches around my belly at navel level
customer_reviews.text: It fits me and I have a 60 belly if that helps you decide if it is big enough. I would do better with a full back brace but can't afford a 100 dollars right now. Half my pain is in the lumbar region and sciatica and this takes care of that pain. It makes you stronger as well by supporting your core muscles. I have owned quite a bit of back braces over the last ten years and for the money you can't beat this one.
customer_reviews.author: Valhalla

customer_reviews.title: SIZING!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my parents. The downside that there is no medium size. I got a plus and it was huge! My dad has a beer belly, it wrapped around him twice. It’s more for like an obese person. Regular size it’s for average skinny 5’5 140lbs, if your a little over just keep in mind you might have to tug it a few times so you can make it hold. Overall after 2 tries of ordering I got it somewhat right. Again, sizing is terrible. My mom is happy with hers, she has 2 since the regular size didn’t fit him.
customer_reviews.author: MJacobs

customer_reviews.title: I should have used it the day I got it .
customer_reviews.text: Just started using November 03 , 2019. Also supports upper abdominal area as well as back ( those so called abdominal binder which roll and DO NOT COVER upper & lower abdominal at same time ) . I have wasted my money on other abdominal bands & I am very disappointed with them . Will buy more to cover upper and lower abdominal . They are very comfortable and good support and DO NOT ROLL.😊
customer_reviews.author: Georgette E Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Holds back upright
customer_reviews.text: I have upper and lower back pain daily. After trying this on it went away instantly. Although, I have difficulty adjusting it. I slept with it one night and woke up with a rash. It made my stomach itch. I gave it a break and after two days the back pain came back. I highly recommend this. I feel total support with it.
customer_reviews.author: Singryd

customer_reviews.title: If you're not sure about it - BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product! As someone who regularly struggles with sciatica, I found this product helps during flare ups by decreasing pain, providing support, and overall decreased the length of my episode. I can't believe I ever lived without this. I will say, to get the necessary support, you do need to keep it pretty tight, which can make sitting down with this uncomfortable - but I don't know where I could find one that provides this level of support that doesn't also come along with a little discomfort from tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Helped mitigate excruciating lumbar back pain and sciatic.
customer_reviews.text: Since working at home during this pandemic my lumbar back pain and sciatica has been an issue due to the sedentary lifestyle. I was at a point I got stuck in my bed due to the pain but with this back brace keeping my back straight I have been able to “train” my body to stand upright again without arching forward. Now I am mowing my grass again, walking to get the mail with very little pain on my right though. Pain would radiate from lower back down right buttock, thigh to cav.
customer_reviews.author: El Cid Preciado

customer_reviews.title: Nailed it
customer_reviews.text: Man, does this thing work great. Seriously. Did exactly what it was supposed to. I definitely notice the difference in my posture after wearing it just 30 minutes. The correction lasts for hours and is way less painful that my last chiropractor visit. I wish it was a little more breathable but, nothing on earth is absolutely perfect. This is pretty close however.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Grandma Loved it For Lower Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: My grandma has a bad back and always has lower back pain. She was very happy with this brace and was happy that I found one that worked. That little extension piece is great and supports the lumbar nicely and the build is quality. I noticed her way more active now. The only negative things she had to say is that it gave her stomach a little bit of discomfort but the pain relief was worth it. (She has a weak stomach already)
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This back brace is very heavy and because of the heaviness, it is uncomfortable. I would recommend this for a large man due to its heaviness. It runs on the large side so it was unable to give me the support that I needed. I would suspect if the correct size is purchased, it would be lighter, would give better support and more pain relief. It is for these reasons that I gave the brace 3 stars. I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: ElleT

customer_reviews.title: Best back brace!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lower back support. It fits nicely between the hips and the rib cage. The Lumbar lump/pad in the middle is added support Tony lower spine which is a great feature. There are 4 braces on the sides of the spine area and if you put it on tight, it will keep you upright. When sitting in an office chair with this brace, posture is remarkable. The width is what keep you nice and upright. Lumbar spondylosis is my case, this is a perfect back brace for vertebrae alignment to manage pain.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Teng

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous help
customer_reviews.text: I will occasionally throw out my back (muscle spasms) where my back is visibly leaning off to one side. This has very strong velcro and is rigid enough to keep me straightened out and allow my muscles to relax. However, it isn't so rigid that it is uncomfortable. An excellent value for the relief it has provided me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rifick

customer_reviews.title: It helped me. Great product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Has great lower back support, like it should. The only reason I give it four stars for pain relief is, because I have arthritis in my lower back/pelvis, nothings going to make the pain go completely away, but it is better. As for four stars on Comfort, hey, it’s a brace it’s not supposed to be real comfortable. It’s supposed to brace. So, this is a really good lower back brace! I’ve always liked Mueller products.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Back pain? This is perfect for that. Hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. It truly is! I had been doing alot of research and reading on what kind of brace to get. I have back pain due to a herniated disk. Once I was in so much pain, 15 minutes into applying the brace, the pain started melting away almost, quicker than taking advil. The back part is padded perfectly where it puts pressure on your muscles to help stabilize your spine, and takes the pain away. I'm very happy with this purchase. Any back pain, sciatica sufferers out there, look no further, this is definitely worth it. I was amazed at how effective it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do. Just cinch it a bit tighter for more support.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Mueller products for a couple of decades now and it's never let me down. The back brace really keeps my lower back from getting all janked up when I am doing a home project or even working on the car. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Fangor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I was having back pain, plus symptoms of sciatic nerve pinch. This brace has helped me feel much better at the end of a long day of sitting at a desk, and provides support while I'm moving or lifting things around the house. I can wear it under clothes, but it is bulky enough that it will be visible under a dress shirt. I've had good results wearing it with a sweater or fleece over top. I have found The best results from wearing it as low as possible, right above my hips. My first few wears I put it too high. Now I align the back seat directly above my tailbone, and cinch it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Susi

customer_reviews.title: The cushion is awesome. Pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered friday night in bed with a back sprain or my herniated l5si flaring up, brace was here by sat night. I put it on today Sunday morning. Cooked pancake breakfast for my guests and able to walk comfortably without jolts of pain all around my pelvis hip and lower back. Really great. The pad in the middle really does the trick if you have a herniated disc and SI problems or illiopsoas syndrome. Got one for my mom who has a complicated compression fracture in l5 from auto acident more than 10 years ago... i think it will help her alot!
customer_reviews.author: aprilspies

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: great belt! I work as a seaman and sometimes I have to lift heavy things. Before, my back often hurt in the lumbar region, it became really easier for me with this belt. recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bohdan

customer_reviews.title: This was better then what the doctor ordered I own three.
customer_reviews.text: I have spinal stenosis but I still have to work this is the only back brace out of 10 that I tried that worked I'm a heavy guy and I need it was strong heavy back brace with real sacrum lumbar support and this fit the ticket I've tried quite a few back braces over the years this was the only one that worked for me in fact I have three of them one for work one for home and one for my man cave.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Matthew Maiara

customer_reviews.title: Solved my back pain
customer_reviews.text: The belt is pretty heavy duty. It does a good job of targeting the lower back. I got the belt because I'd hurt my back and it wasn't getting better on it's own. After two weeks I was good as new. I now wear the belt before I do any heavy work, prevention is the best medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Way too big (and smaller size too small)
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered the size up to 50”, it was too small even though my waist was smaller than 50” (actually 47”), so I returned for this one. Received this one today and it was so big that I couldn’t even secure the main strap because it went past the Velcro. There needs to be an in between size.
customer_reviews.author: C Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: WHAT IS THE LEFT SIDE FLAP SUPPOSED TO DO?
customer_reviews.text: I am a male with a size 38" waist so I ordered the size 28-50 brace, and I find that the left flap is useless for tightening the brace. When you bring it around there is no opposing Velcro for it to stick to. The right flap works perfectly. Other than the useless left flap that just gets in the way (And I am tempted to cut off), I am pretty pleased with the brace especially the fact that it is wide and firm, does not roll up, and covers all of my lower right back muscles that have been giving me trouble..
customer_reviews.author: Logan Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This brace exceeded my expectations! It’s comfortable, doesn’t ride up at all, and gives excellent support. I bought it because it appeared to have decent support, and the price is low. This brace is better than the one I had been using, and that one cost three times the price of this one!
customer_reviews.author: B. Call

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and such good support. It really keeps the pain away and lets me walk with out my back giving out. I have had the same Mueller Lumbar Support Back Brace for 7 years, maybe more. This week I decided to buy a new brace since my old brace is kind of wore out. I have put a lot of miles on that brace and it still works, it just doesn't look as good as it did 7 years ago. Today I started wearing my new Mueller Lumbar Support Back Brace. It is just as good as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Not true to the size. Bulky and not comfortable. restricts the mobility when u need to sit ,bend.
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and not comfortable. restricts the mobility when u need to sit ,bend. if I could give a zero rating I will give that to this product. sizing is misleading even if you follow the seller sizing guide. worst product I ever purchased,iam an international customer at first I thought of returning the item and then again it seems that I have to pay for the return shipping. I don't think I will ship it back, I will just pack it away in the store room. what a waste of money. money I paid for it gone in the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Sriya

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lumbar support belt!
customer_reviews.text: This item provides excellent support for the lumbar spine. Easy adjustment. Durable material. I use mine at work, I'm an RN with a bulging lumbar disc. I always wear it at home when I'm lifting and working on home improvent projects or working in the yard. A must when moving and lifting furnture along with rubber gloves that prove excellent grip and leveraging. I purchased two of these belts. I wash them in a mesh bag on a gentle cycle. They come out like new. I've had one for at least 3 years and it still looks brand new. The Velcro still holds securely and the elastic is extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: lvfixit

customer_reviews.title: Can’t do without it.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this for long 12-hour shifts. Gives me pain control without taking any kind of pain medicine. Been wearing it for several years now. Still in good shape. I don’t hand wash it. I close the Velcro flaps and throw it in the washer then hang to dry. It’s held up fine. Added bonus: when wearing, it holds my stomach in and makes me feel full while at work. I eat much less.
customer_reviews.author: ann h.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is different - BUT this worked Great for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality when I first opened the package. I was even more impressed by the positive effect on my back pain as soon as I put it on!!! AND at this great price! Even at the original price, I say to myself: Why didn't I find and try this product SOONER!!! I don't know if any of the other products have a Lumbar1 Support at this price! The belt comes down further on my back, and this, combined with the lumbar support have worked GREAT for me!!! Thank you, Muller!!! and, as always, thank you Amazing Amazon for making this available to me!!!
customer_reviews.author: bigDamazon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of issues in my mid and lower back and suffer from chronic pain. I've tried several different brands/styles of back braces and this one has been the best value. It gives good support and as much pain relief for myself as any other brace I've worn. It's also very comfortable and I don't mind leaving it on for long periods. I wear an under shirt with the brace on top of it and my scrubs on top of that and no one seems to notice the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help for me.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I sent it back for a refund, but i waited too long i think. I bought this for my lower back pain which stems from having 2 kids and finally bought this to help with at least some of the pain, but it didn't help at all for me. Not to mention that sucker is uncomfortable! I personally didn't have any relief from this but maybe someone else in my family will.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: An excellent brace for those with lower back problems.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from disk disease and found when I used my stationary bike my lower back would ache. This brace is made very well and, low priced and is exactly what I needed--no more backaches riding the bike. However, it runs small; it comes in two sizes and the smaller size claims to fit anyone up to 50 " (I'm not sure if that's the hip measurement or the waist). I am way smaller than 50" either place and it fits me perfectly--I can't imagine anyone much bigger than me finding this size satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: lilymoon

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Sounds dramatic but it really did. I threw out my back on my birthday weekend and didn't want to sit home and wallow. My friend brought this brace for me to try. I literally couldn't stand up straight, threw this baby on and within 5 minutes my shoulders lowered, my muscles eased and I was walking completely normal. I ordered it immediately and am about to order another as a back up. I can't be within this!!
customer_reviews.author: epinurse

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and 117 lbs with an athletic, muscular frame. I wear a size 2 in Misses and this belt strangles me. I am hoping it will stretch out, but it is not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chessie430

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my severe sciatica pain!
customer_reviews.text: This brace was very well made. Although I’m a very large woman and most of the other braces I’ve tried always rolled down, this brace stays in place. It started helping the pain in my lower back within an hour. The things I don’t like is that it’s heavy and I wish it wasn’t quite as wide as it is. I really wish Mueller made a S I belt for the larger person. Overall this brace does what it says it will do and I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Lumbar support helps so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this back brace! I have several bulging disc and spinal stenosis and this belt let's me move without to much pain. I've worn other braces but they were big and clunky where this one is comfortable. I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt
customer_reviews.text: This works as described. Bought it to help get past some lower-back spasms. Not sure if it helped or not, but it certainly didn't hurt. Should be good for doing heavy lifting, if combined with correct form and posture. Wouldn't want to wear it all day, as it does get a little warm and sweaty under there after a while. But all-in-all, it's exactly what you should expect. Seems well made and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief for a Chef
customer_reviews.text: I am a cook and usually on my feet for a minimum of 14 hours each shift. I had always suffered from back problems especially just 6 hours into the day. Ever since I put this on, I instantly felt a relief off my tailbone and lower back where I was having the most issues. I went on to complete a shift without thinking of a painful back! I love this product and wish I had gotten it sooner. I also purchased one for my father and he loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kaewchandee

customer_reviews.title: Relieves the pain.
customer_reviews.text: The brace is high quality, great pricing, fits good and fastens tight, but still is comfortable. The best thing is it gives me greater protection from back strain and allows me to work longer. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: It’s a miracle.
customer_reviews.text: This brace is amazing. I have L5-6 s1 disc deterioration which cause me pain in my buttock when sitting in a car, etc, and sometimes down the back of my leg. After a few hours wearing this around he house, the pain (that has been there for years) just stopped. It was like magic. I bought a second one for my husband at Home Depot for $15. And it’s just as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that helps and fits bigger sizes
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering over a year with a back injury. This brace does not miraculously cure my pain but the support that it offers significantly improves my pain tolerance and physical function throughout the day. I purchased the 50"-70" size as I have almost 70" hips and it does fit easily and comfortably in place. If needed, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: I have had lower back trouble for years and usually seek help from my chiropractor..however due to the corona19 out break I’m stuck at home. This brace offered me relief in approximately 4 hours I’m very pleased with this purchace
customer_reviews.author: Judy gaghyan

product_meta.title: Mueller 255 Lumbar Support Back Brace with Removable Pad, Black, Regular(Package May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:Regular (Pack of 1)Lumbar Back Brace w/Removable Pad This premium back brace helps relieve lower back pain from strains, sprains and muscle spasms. Double layer design allows for custom fit and adjustable compression to abdomen and lower back. Helps provide relief from injuries and strenuous activity to keep you active. Breathable fabric for comfortable all-day wear. Removable lumbar pad cushions and compresses the lower back for concentrated support Internal molded plastic component eliminates brace rolling or bunching Custom fit with dual, outer elastic tension straps Listed: 255 Black - Fits waist sizes 28 - 50" (71 - 127 cm) Also available: 64179 Black - Plus Size fits waist sizes 50 - 70" (127 - 177 cm). Note: Consult with your medical professional, before purchase, if you have questions if this item is appropriate for your condition. Please be very aware that the information we provide about the products we sell is neither intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider/therapist before starting any new treatment or exercise regimen with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Medical braces, supports and certain other health care/rehabilitation .Packaging may vary

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Mueller Sports Medicine, Inc. PO Box 99, Prairie du Sac WI 53578
feature_bullets: Internal molded plastic component eliminates brace rolling or bunching

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
